Description: Large 4 bed, 2 bath apartment available right next to Chateau and Main Street in Waltham! This second floor unit has a good sized living area with kitchen, 6 bedrooms (2 downstairs, 4 upstairs), and 2 full baths. The apartment comes with gas heating, 5 off street parking spots, and in unit laundry. Landlord pays for water/sewer. Tenants pay for gas, electricity, cable, and takes care of snow removal. First months rent, security deposit, and one months rent broker fee due at lease signing. Available for move in 9/1!
